document.full_text: unease is growing among poles living near the probable site of their country's first nuclear power plant after japan's disaster but the polish government is adamant that nuclear power is safe and remains the best option.
document.title: poles uneasy on nuclear plant plan, government says safe
lines_and_colors: unease is growing among poles living near the probable site of their country's first nuclear power plant after japan's disaster but the polish government is adamant that nuclear power is safe and remains the best option.
